objects.src: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080'><defs><linearGradient id='mainGrad' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#0a0a0a'/><stop offset='50%' style='stop-color:#1a1a2e'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#16213e'/></linearGradient><linearGradient id='accentGrad' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#FF6B35'/><stop offset='50%' style='stop-color:#F7931E'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#FFD23F'/></linearGradient></defs><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#mainGrad)'/><path d='M0,0 L0,1080 L900,1080 L1080,0 Z' fill='#0a0a0a' opacity='0.8'/><path d='M1080,0 L1080,1080 L180,1080 L0,0 Z' fill='url(#accentGrad)' opacity='0.1'/><path d='M0,0 L1080,1080' stroke='#FF6B35' stroke-width='3' opacity='0.3'/><circle cx='100' cy='100' r='150' fill='#FF6B35' opacity='0.05'/><circle cx='980' cy='980' r='200' fill='#1E3A8A' opacity='0.1'/><g transform='rotate(-45, 540, 540)'><rect x='200' y='200' width='4' height='400' fill='#FF6B35' opacity='0.4'/><rect x='300' y='100' width='6' height='600' fill='#1E3A8A' opacity='0.3'/><rect x='500' y='150' width='3' height='500' fill='#FF6B35' opacity='0.2'/></g><path d='M50 50 L100 20 L150 50 L100 80 Z' fill='#FF6B35' opacity='0.15'/><path d='M950 950 L1000 920 L1050 950 L1000 980 Z' fill='#1E3A8A' opacity='0.15'/></svg>

product_details.description: NA 6 GB RAM | 128 GB ROM 17.22 cm (6.78 inch) Display 64MP Rear Camera | 13MP Front Camera 5500 mAh Battery Dimensity 7300 Ultimate Processor

banner_details:
This banner features a modern and tech-savvy design, ideal for promoting a smartphone product. It uses a diagonal split layout with a gradient dark background, accented with thin geometric lines for a dynamic, futuristic feel. The main title text layer (`heading`) is bold, uppercase, and placed at the top left, while the vibrant subheading (`subheading`) in orange visually pops beneath it. The feature summary text (`description`) is neatly aligned below the subheading. A high-tech phone image (`product_image`) dominates the right half, showcasing the product. Pricing (`price`) and a call-to-action button (`cta_button`, `cta`) are positioned at the bottom left for emphasis.

**Color Palette**:
- Background Gradient: #0a0a0a → #16213e
- Accent Gradient: #FF6B35 → #F7931E → #FFD23F
- Text Colors: White (#FFFFFF), Light Gray (#E0E0E0), Accent Orange (#FF6B35)
- Button Color: #FF6B35
product_color: The product image uses a bold and futuristic color palette featuring dark graphite gray (#1C1C1E) as the base, conveying a tech-savvy and premium feel. Neon orange (#FF4C00) accents add energy and highlight key elements like the branding and eyewear in the ad, drawing attention effectively. Cool teal (#00B6A1) and cyan highlights (#00FFFF) on the model’s face create visual contrast and a cyberpunk aesthetic. The black background (#000000) makes the vibrant elements pop, enhancing depth. The smooth blending of dark and neon tones gives a sleek, modern vibe, ideal for youth-centric, tech-forward advertisement banners.
